label: plant trait
description: A measurable or observable characteristic of a cellular component [GO:0005575], biological process [GO:0008150] or molecular function [GO:0003674] that is part of, or has participant a plant anatomical entity [PO:0025131] and/or a plant structure development stage [PO:0009012]. This includes physiological, molecular and biochemical traits as well.

label: biochemical trait
description: A plant trait [TO:0000387] which is a quality of a chemical entity [CHEBI:24431], a plant metabolite [CHEBI:76924], or a molecular function [GO:0003674], which occurs in a cellular component [GO:0005575], plant anatomical entity [PO:0025131] or during a plant structure development stage [PO:0009012].
hierarchy: biochemical trait

label: mineral and ion content trait
description: A biochemical trait [TO:0000277] that is the amount of a particular mineral or ion constituent occurring in a plant anatomical entity [PO:0025131].
hierarchy: mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: leaf mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on a leaf [PO:0025034].
tier_3: leaf mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: leaf mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: live leaf mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on a live [PATO:0001421] leaf [PO:0025034].
tier_3: leaf mineral and ion content trait
tier_4: live leaf mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: live leaf mineral and ion content trait < leaf mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: senesced leaf mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on a senescent [PATO:0001487] leaf [PO:0025034].
tier_3: leaf mineral and ion content trait
tier_4: senesced leaf mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: senesced leaf mineral and ion content trait < leaf mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: stem mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on a stem [PO:0009047].
tier_3: stem mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: stem mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: wood mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on wood [NCIT:C93062].
tier_3: wood mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: wood mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: senesced wood mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on senescent [PATO:0001487] wood [NCIT:C93062].
tier_3: wood mineral and ion content trait
tier_4: senesced wood mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: senesced wood mineral and ion content trait < wood mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: bark mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on bark [PO:0004518].
tier_3: bark mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: bark mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: root mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on a root [PO:0009005].
tier_3: root mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: root mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: reproductive shoot system mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on the reproductive shoot system [PO:0025082].
tier_3: reproductive shoot system mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: reproductive shoot system mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: cell or tissue mineral and ion content trait
description: A mineral and ion content trait which is measured on an individual tissue [CARO:0000043] type or cell [CL:0000000] type.
tier_3: cell or tissue mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: cell or tissue mineral and ion content trait < mineral and ion content trait < biochemical trait

label: metabolite content trait
description: The trait associated with an assay to determine the affected metabolites profile.
hierarchy: metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: carbohydrate content trait
description: A metabolite content trait [TO:0000281] which is the amount of carbohydrate [CHEBI:16646] in a plant structure [PO:0009011].
tier_3: bark mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: carbohydrate content trait < metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: lipid content trait
description: The total lipid [CHEBI:18059] content measured in a plant or a plant part.
tier_3: root mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: lipid content trait < metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: phenolic compound content trait
description: Amount of phenolics present in the plant part, whole plant or product.
tier_3: reproductive shoot system mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: phenolic compound  content trait < metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: pigment content trait
description: A metabolite content trait [TO:0000281] which is the amount of pigment [NCIT:C747] in a plant structure [PO:0009011].
tier_3: cell or tissue mineral and ion content trait
hierarchy: pigment content trait < metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: protein content trait
description: The total protein content measured in a plant or a plant part.
hierarchy: protein content trait < metabolite content trait < biochemical trait

label: stable isotope ratio determination
description: A mineral and ion content trait [TO:0000465] which is a ratio [PATO:0001470] of two naturally occurring stable isotopes [EnvThes:20310], generally expressed in delta notation.
hierarchy: stable isotope ratio determination < biochemical trait

label: plant morphology trait
description: A plant trait [TO:0000387] which is a morphological quality of a plant anatomical entity [PO:0025131] or a constituent cellular component [GO:0005575] contained therein. Includes traits of plant structures [PO:0009011] such as plant cell [PO:0009002], plant organ [PO:0009008], portion of plant tissue [PO:0009007], vascular system [PO:0000034], whole plant [PO:0000003] and seed [PO:0009010], as well as those of plant anatomical spaces [PO:0025117] and portions of plant substance [PO:0025161].
hierarchy: plant morphology trait

label: whole plant morphology trait
description: A plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000839] which is a quality of a whole plant [PO:0000003].
hierarchy: whole plant morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: plant embryo morphology trait
description: A whole plant morphology trait [TO:0000398] which is a quality of a plant embryo [PO:0009009].
hierarchy: plant embryo morphology trait < whole plant morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: plant structure morphology trait
description: A plant morphology trait [TO:0000017] which is a quality of a plant structure [PO:0009011].
hierarchy: plant structure morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf morphology trait
description: A phyllome morphology trait [TO:0000747] which is quality of a leaf [PO:0025034].
hierarchy: leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf size trait
description: Refer to size [PATO:0000117]: A morphology quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearers physical magnitude.
hierarchy: leaf size trait < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf mass trait
description: A leaf morphology trait [TO:0000505] which is the weight of a leaf [PO:0025034].
hierarchy: leaf mass trait < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf shape trait
description: A leaf morphology trait [TO:0000748] which is the variation in shapes and forms of a leaf [PO:0025034]. Refer to shape [PATO:0000052]: A morphological quality inhering in a bearer by virtue of the bearers ratios of distances between its features [points, edges, surfaces and also holes etc].
hierarchy: leaf shape trait < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf position trait
description: A leaf morphology trait [TO:0000748] which refers to the position [PATO:0000140] of leaves [PO:0025034] relative to the stem [PO:0009047].
hierarchy: leaf position trait < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: portion of plant tissue morphology trait
description: A plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000839] which is a quality of a portion of plant tissue [PO:0009007].
tier_3: portion of plant tissue morphology trait
hierarchy: portion of plant tissue morphology trait < plant structure morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: plant cell morphology trait
description: A plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000839] which is a quality of a plant cell [PO:0009002].
hierarchy: plant cell morphology trait < plant structure morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf stomatal complex morphology trait
description: A vascular leaf morphology trait [TO:0000419] which is a quality of the stomatal complexes [PO:0002000] present on the leaf surface.
hierarchy: leaf stomatal complex morphology trait  < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf optical properties trait
description: Leaf morphology trait [TO:0000748] associated with the leafs optical [NCIT:C16940] properties, including the absorption [SWEET:soprocw:Absorption], transmission [SWEET:soprocw:Transmission], and reflection [SWEET:soprocw:Reflection] of light [OMIT:0009112].
hierarchy: leaf optical properties trait < leaf morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: stem morphology trait
description: A shoot axis morphology trait [TO:0000739] which is the quality of a stem [PO:0009047].
hierarchy: stem morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: stem mass trait
description: A stem morphology trait [TO:0000361] which is the mass [PATO:0000125] of a stem [PO:0009047].
hierarchy: stem mass trait < stem morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: bark morphology trait
description: A plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000736] which is a quality of bark [PO:0004518].
hierarchy: bark morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: bark mass trait
description: A bark morphology trait which is the mass of bark.
hierarchy: bark mass trait < bark morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: root system morphology trait
description: A collective plant organ structure morphology trait [TO:0000842] which is a quality of a root system [PO:0025025].
hierarchy: root system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: root morphology trait
description: A plant axis morphology trait [TO:0000738] which is a quality of a root [PO:0025025].
hierarchy: root system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: root mass trait
description: A root morphology trait [TO:0000043] which is the weight of a root [PO:0009005].
hierarchy: root mass trait < root system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: root branchiness trait
description: A root system morphology trait [TO:0000985] which is the branchiness [PATO:0002009] of the root system [PO:0025025].
hierarchy: root branchiness trait < root system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: reproductive shoot system morphology trait
description: A shoot system morphology trait [TO:0000077] that is a quality of a reproductive shoot system [PO:0025082].
hierarchy: reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: floral organ morphology trait
description: A plant organ morphology trait [TO:0000736] which is a quality of a floral organ [PO:0025395].
hierarchy: floral organ morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: perianth morphology trait
description: A collective phyllome structure morphology trait [TO:0000845] which is a quality of a perianth [PO:0009058].
hierarchy: perianth morphology trait < floral organ morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: androecium morphology trait
description: A collective phyllome structure morphology trait [TO:0000845] that is a quality of the androecium [PO:0009061].
hierarchy: androecium morphology trait < floral organ morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: gynoecium morphology trait
description: A collective phyllome structure morphology trait [TO:0000845] that is a quality of the gynoecium [PO:0009062].
hierarchy: gynoecium morphology trait < floral organ morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: fruit morphology trait
description: A multi-tissue plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000836] which is a quality of a fruit [PO:0009001].
hierarchy: fruit morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: seed morphology trait
description: A multi-tissue plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000836] which is a quality of a seed [PO:0009010].
hierarchy: seed morphology trait < reproductive shoot system morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: vascular tissue morphology trait
description: A portion of plant tissue morphology trait [TO:0000843] which is a quality of a vascular tissue and its parts.
hierarchy: vascular tissue morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: leaf vein morphology trait
description: A vascular leaf morphology trait [TO:0000419] which is a quality of a leaf lamina vein [PO:0020138].
hierarchy: leaf vein morphology trait < vascular tissue morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: xylem vessel morphology trait
description: A vascular tissue morphology trait [TO:0000470] which is a quality of a xylem vessel [PO:0025417].
hierarchy: xylem vessel morphology trait < vascular tissue morphology trait < plant morphology trait

label: plant structure strength trait
description: A plant structure morphology trait [TO:0000736] pertaining to the strength [PATO:0001230] of a plant structure [PO:0009011] and often indicating the amount of work [PATO:0001026] required to break or deform the plant structure.
hierarchy: plant structure strength trait < plant morphology trait

label: biological process trait, physiological process trait
description: Refers to process quality [PATO:0001236]: A quality which inheres in an process. A plant trait [TO:0000387] which is a process quality [PATO:0001236] of a biological process [GO:0008150] which occurs in a plant anatomical entity [PO:0025131], a cellular component [GO:0005575], or during a plant structure development stage [PO:0009012].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: photosynthetic trait
description: A plant physiological process trait [TO:0000283] associated with photosynthesis [GO:0015979].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: photosynthetic trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: gas exchange trait
description: A  plant photosynthesis trait pertaining to the movement [NCIT:C37994] of carbon dioxide [CHEBI:16526], water [CHEBI:15377], and oxygen [CHEBI:15379] into and out of a plant cellular metabolic processes [GO:0044237] where these molecules are the reactant [SIO:000879] or product [SIO:010363].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: gas exchange trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: photosynthetic rate trait
description: The total amount of carbon fixed by the plant per unit time and is measured by determining the changes in CO2 concentration over a plant leaf in a glass enclosure.
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: photosynthetic rate trait < gas exchange trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: respiration rate trait
description: A plant gas exchange trait which is the net rate of carbon dioxide [CHEBI:16526] released from a whole plant [PO:0000003] or plant organ [PO:0009008] due to cellular respiration [GO:0045333] and photorespiration [GO:0009853].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: respiration rate trait < gas exchange trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: transpiration rate trait
description: A plant gas exchange trait which is the rate of transpiration [ENVO:02500035].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: transpiration rate trait < gas exchange trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: carbon dioxide concentration trait
description: A plant gas exchange trait which is the concentration [PATO:0000033] of carbon dioxide [CHEBI:16526].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: carbon dioxide concentration trait < gas exchange trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: photosystem performance trait
description: A plant photosynthesis trait pertaining to the performance [NCIT:C60778] of the photosystem [GO:0009521] complexes, especially with regard to how effectively they process photosynthetically active radiation [ENVO:01001864] during the photosynthesis light reactions [GO:0019684].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: photosystem performance trait < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: water transport trait, hydraulic trait
description: A plant physiological process trait [TO:0000283] pertaining to the movement [NCIT:C37994] of water [CHEBI:15377] through a plants vascular system [PO:0000034], including water stress traits [TO:0000237].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: water transport trait, hydraulic trait  < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: nutrient recycling trait
description: A plant physiological process trait [TO:0000283] associated with the resorption [NCIT:C93204] and recycling [NCIT:C126395] of macronutrients [CHEBI:33937] and micronutrients [CHEBI:27027] as plant structures [PO:0009011] senesce [PATO:0001487].
tier_1: biological process trait, physiological process trait
hierarchy: nutrient recycling trait  < biological process trait, physiological process trait

label: life history trait
description: A plant trait [TO:0000387] pertaining to an individuals life history [ECOCORE:00000018].
hierarchy: life history trait

label: whole plant phenotype trait
description: A plant life history trait which is a whole plant phenotype [FLOPO:0000089].
hierarchy: whole plant phenotype trait < life history trait

label: plant phenological trait
description: A growth and development trait [TO:0000357] which is the timing of the occurrence of plant structure development stages [PO:0009012] and the relevant biological processes [GO:0008150].
hierarchy: plant phenological trait < life history trait

label: interspecific interactions trait
description: A plant life history trait that captures an interspecific interaction between organisms [GO:0044419].
hierarchy: interspecific interactions trait < life history trait

label: genetic structure trait
description: A plant life history trait that captures information about genetic structures.
hierarchy: genetic structure trait < life history trait

label: reproductive structure life history trait
description: A plant life history trait pertaining to a plants reproductive structures [UBERON:0005156].
hierarchy: reproductive structure life history trait < life history trait

label: fire response trait
description: A plant life history trait indicating adaptations [NCIT:C158868] to increase survival rate [EnvThes:21065] or seed germination [GO_0009845] rate following fire [ENVO:01000786] or indicating a plants response [NCIT:C25755] to fire.
hierarchy: fire response trait < life history trait

label: chemical stress sensitivity trait
description: Response by the plant in terms of resistivity or senility to chemical stress.
hierarchy: chemical stress sensitivity trait < life history trait

label: environmental tolerance trait
description: A plant life history trait indicating adaptations [NCIT:C158868] to specific environmental conditions [ENVO:01000203] or tolerance [NCIT:C43414] to specific environmental stresses [EnvThes:21245].
hierarchy: environmental tolerance trait < life history trait
